nodes.name: Listing

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(string storage ref,string storage ref,uint256,address,string storage ref,string storage ref,enum Listing.State)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get a summary of the listing
@return string, string, uint address, string, string. State
nodes.name: getSummary

nodes.documentation:
@dev Payable to be called by buyer to initiate the sale. Emits SaleInitiated() to alert the buyer, if the listing is available and the value matches asking price
@param _buyer_public_key Public key corresponding to the buyers private key. This key will be used by the seller to encrypt the item string before transfer. The encryption algorithm has to be decided beforehand (Test cases use RSA)
nodes.name: initiateSale

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by seller"

arguments.value: Can only be called by seller

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by seller"

nodes.documentation:
@dev To be called by the seller to get buyer's public key.
@return string
nodes.name: getBuyerKey

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by seller"

arguments.value: Can only be called by seller

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by seller"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Sale not yet RECEIVED by seller"

arguments.value: Sale not yet RECEIVED by seller

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Sale not yet RECEIVED by seller"

nodes.documentation:
@dev To be called by seller on hearing a SaleInitiated() event. Emits a ItemTransferred() event which provides the encrypted string to the buyer (or anyone else listening)
@param _encrypted_item Item string encrypted with the public key of the buyer
nodes.name: transferItem

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Item not yet transferred by seller"

arguments.value: Item not yet transferred by seller

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Item not yet transferred by seller"

nodes.documentation:
@dev To be called by buyer to receive the encypted item
@return string
nodes.name: getItem

devdoc.author: Akshat Chhajer, Shivansh Seth, Istasis Mishra
devdoc.details: A smart contract to create and manage a single listing

constructor.details: Constructor for the contract. Creates a new listing

params._description: A brief description of the item
params._name: Name of the the listed item (not same as the item string)
params._price: The asking price for the item as decided by the buyer
params.sender: Address of the person creating the listing

getBuyerKey().details: To be called by the seller to get buyer's public key.

getItem().details: To be called by buyer to receive the encypted item

getSummary().details: Get a summary of the listing
getSummary().return: string, string, uint address, string, string. State

initiateSale(string).details: Payable to be called by buyer to initiate the sale. Emits SaleInitiated() to alert the buyer, if the listing is available and the value matches asking price

params._buyer_public_key: Public key corresponding to the buyers private key. This key will be used by the seller to encrypt the item string before transfer. The encryption algorithm has to be decided beforehand (Test cases use RSA)

transferItem(string).details: To be called by seller on hearing a SaleInitiated() event. Emits a ItemTransferred() event which provides the encrypted string to the buyer (or anyone else listening)

params._encrypted_item: Item string encrypted with the public key of the buyer

devdoc.title: Listing
